analysis.description:
Manager._transferTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x0e80d0540fc64099aad090c245857f35e1efa368.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(new_token.balanceOf(recipient) == initial_balance + amount)

Reentrancy in Manager.release (/unique_chucks/21/0x0e80d0540fc64099aad090c245857f35e1efa368.sol#385-392):
	External calls:
	- presale_tokens = presale_token.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/21/0x0e80d0540fc64099aad090c245857f35e1efa368.sol#386)
	- tokens_to_release = presale_tokens - totalReleased(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/21/0x0e80d0540fc64099aad090c245857f35e1efa368.sol#389)
	- _transferTokens(msg.sender,tokens_to_release) (/unique_chucks/21/0x0e80d0540fc64099aad090c245857f35e1efa368.sol#390-391)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/21/0x0e80d0540fc64099aad090c245857f35e1efa368.sol#391-392)
Parameter '_new' of Owned.setOwner (/unique_chucks/21/0x0e80d0540fc64099aad090c245857f35e1efa368.sol#336) is not in mixedCase
